personal.name: Priyanshu Singh
personal.title: Backend Software Engineer
personal.tagline: Backend engineer crafting scalable systems that solve real problems.

about.title: About me
about.description: Backend Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience building scalable microservices, integrating payment systems, and optimizing cloud-native solutions.
paragraphs: I'm a backend engineer specializing in scalable microservices and cloud-native solutions. My expertise spans Node.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, Redis, and AWS.
I focus on building high-performance systems that deliver real business impact. From payment processing handling $2M+ monthly transactions to podcast platforms serving 10,000+ concurrent users.

experience.description: Building scalable backend systems and microservices for enterprise clients
achievements: Architected KYC onboarding system deployed by 3 US banks with NestJS and PostgreSQL.
Built payment processing handling $2M+ monthly across 4 providers with 99.99% uptime.

experience.description: Developed ERP modules for government authorities
achievements: Built ERP modules for 13+ government authorities with MySQL and Spring Boot.
Optimized SQL queries, reducing report time from 15 min to 45 sec (96% faster).

projects.name: AI-Powered HR Assistant
projects.shortDescription: AI chatbot handling 1,000+ daily HR queries with 92% accuracy using GPT-4 and vector search.
projects.longDescription: Built intelligent AI chatbot handling 1,000+ daily HR queries (policies, leaves, notices) using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4, achieving 92% query resolution accuracy and reducing HR workload by 45%. Integrated PostgreSQL with SQL Agents for DML operations, processing 500+ database transactions daily with 99.9% data integrity and <50ms query response time. Implemented FAISS vector embeddings for semantic search across 10,000+ documents, improving search accuracy by 25% and reducing search latency from 2 seconds to 300ms.

projects.name: Payment Service
projects.shortDescription: Microservices payment gateway processing 5,000+ daily transactions with unified API and design patterns.
projects.longDescription: Developed modular microservices-based payment service processing 5,000+ daily transactions across 4 payment providers using unified API, reducing integration time for new providers from 2 weeks to 3 days. Applied Strategy and Factory design patterns for provider selection and instantiation, improving code maintainability by 40% and reducing duplicate code by 65%.

projects.name: Real-time Podcast Platform
projects.shortDescription: Real-time podcast platform with WebRTC and Socket.io serving 10,000+ concurrent listeners.
projects.longDescription: Built a high-scale podcast application using WebRTC, Icecast, Socket.io, Ably, RabbitMQ, handling 10,000+ concurrent listeners with real-time audio streaming, chat features, and live analytics dashboard.
